page.title: 05Dovercourt Holiday Camp
page.content: {Warners holiday camp}was built in 1947.It can accommodate 820 people, and the holiday season runs from 18th May to 28th September. The attractions include horse and pony riding, and a pets corner with ducks, hens, peacocks and rabbits. Sports facilities include an outdoor heated swimming pool, badminton,tennis and volleyball courts,a football pitch, croquet, crazy golf and putting greens. Guests are fed in a self-service dining room with 520 tables. The dishes are washed in a huge washing-up machine 19 feet long. There is also a snack bar, hairdressing salon, evening disco and much other entertainment. Guests sleep in chalets with one or two rooms, most of them with a bathroom and toilet. It is a good place to stay for a holiday, as there is so much to do.
